trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an operation is attempted on a transaction that is in doubt, or an attempt is made to commit the transaction and the transaction becomes InDoubt.
trans-unit.target: 对处于不确定的事务尝试操作，或尝试提交事务，事务时引发的异常将成为 InDoubt。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an action is attempted on a transaction that is in doubt.
trans-unit.target: 当尝试对状态不明的事务进行的操作时，引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: A transaction is in doubt when the state of the transaction cannot be determined.
trans-unit.target: 当无法确定事务的状态，事务将处于不确定。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the final outcome of the transaction, whether it commits or aborts, is never known for this transaction.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，事务，最终结果是提交还是中止，永远是未知的此事务。

trans-unit.source: This exception is also thrown when an attempt is made to commit the transaction and the transaction becomes InDoubt.
trans-unit.target: 当尝试提交事务并事务成为 InDoubt，也会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionInDoubtException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionInDoubtException"></xref> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionInDoubtException"></xref>使用指定的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，其中包含一条消息，说明发生异常的原因。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionInDoubtException"></xref> class with the specified serialization and streaming context information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionInDoubtException"></xref>类，该类具有指定的序列化和流式处理上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that describes a failed serialization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>描述失败的序列化的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that describes a failed serialization context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>描述失败的序列化上下文的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionInDoubtException"></xref> class with the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionInDoubtException"></xref>使用指定的消息和内部异常的类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，其中包含一条消息，说明发生异常的原因。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception instance that causes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 获取导致当前异常的异常实例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property.
